body.p: Alexandria, Campbell County, Kentucky attorney. Campbell County, Kentucky native. Married Sarah B. Bell Baker in 1841. Married Mary Jane Orr Baker in 1853. Father of William B. Baker and Sarah B. Baker. Campbell County Deputy Sheriff from 1838 to 1841. Independently studied law from 1841 to 1842. Graduated from the Cincinnati Law School in 1843. Began legal practice in 1844 in Alexandria. Campbell County Attorney from 1846 to 1848. Served in the Kentucky General Assembly in 1849. Served in the Senate of the Kentucky General Assembly from 1861 to 1869. Ran unsuccessfully for governor in 1863. Served in the House of Representatives of the Kentucky General Assembly from 1871 to 1873.
